==Trivia==
* In many languages, the name of this constellation references {{Fr|L'amour est un oiseau rebelle}}, more commonly known as the {{w|Habanera (aria)|Habanera}} aria from the ''{{w|Carmen}}'' opera written by {{w|Georges Bizet}}.
